instruction.en:
Inclusion = Add

To start the motion detector's inclusion mode, turn the device's control dial (E) to "Set" and back to "0" within 5 seconds.
\r
4) To put the device into inclusion mode, turn the device's control dial (E) to "Set" and back to "0" within 5 seconds. The status LED (F) lights up to show that this mode is selected.
5) The app displays a confirmation message once inclusion has been successfully completed.

hint.en: Group 2 is used for directly controlling Z-Wave devices via BASIC SET commands through the evaluation of movement and light as with internal use (so that all of these devices work together). This is intended for use especially with third-party devices that do not implement reactions for mo- tion events.
Group 3 sends Notification reports (MOTION_BEGIN and MOTION_END frames.

Ambient Light via group 4 is intended to substitute locally measured LUX values in target devices – so that the network can have one source of ambient light value. The frame rate is a value being sent a maximum of once per 2.5 minutes, and a minimum of once per 15 minutes.

instruction.en:
Exclusion = Remove

To start the motion detector's exclusion mode, turn the device's control dial (E) to "Set" and back to "0" within 5 seconds.

Removing IS 140-2 from the Smart Friends system:
1) In the rooms view, activate the edit mode.
2) Select the device in the chosen room and press the "delete" button. Press delete and follow the instructions in the app.
3) To put the device into exclusion mode, turn the device's control dial (E) to "Set" and back to "0" within 5 seconds. The red status LED (F) lights up to show that this mode is selected.
4) The app displays a confirmation message once exclusion has been successfully completed.

hint.en:
Duration of light switched on after motion detection.
Default: 180 s
Range: 5 - 900
hint.nl:
Tijdsduur waarin het licht ingeschakeld is na bewegingsdetectie.
Standaard: 180 s
Bereik: 5 - 900

hint.en:
Light threshold (lux) value can be controlled via potentiometer – potentiometer value is used as the default value and any potentiometer movement rewrites the current setting.
Default: 2
Range: 0, 2 - 2000
0 = run Learn ambient light sequence (the level is set automatically)
2000 - is used as daylight (always night mode)
hint.nl:
lichtsterkte niveau (lux) instelbaar via potentiometer – potentiometer value wordt gebruikt als standaard waarde en elke potentiometer aanpassing overschrijft de huidige instelling.
Standaard: 2
Bereik: 0, 2 - 2000
0 = run leer de ambient light sequence (het niveau wordt automatisch ingesteld)
2000 - daglicht waarde (altijd nacht modus)

hint.en:
Motion Sensor (PIR) Sensitivity [%] value can be controlled via potentiometer – potentiometer value is used as the default value and any potentiometer movement rewrites the current setting.
Default: 100
Range: 2, 100
hint.nl:
Bewegingssensor (PIR) gevoeligheid [%] instelbaar via potentiometer – potentiometer value wordt gebruikt als standaard waarde en elke potentiometer aanpassing overschrijft de huidige instelling.
Standaard: 100 
Bereik: 2 - 100

label.en: Illumination measuring interval when switched ON (min)

hint.en:
Interval for ambient light measuring when lamp is on (lamp switches off shortly and measures). 
Default: 0, 
Range: 0, 5 - 120 [min]
0 = function is off
hint.nl:
Interval lichtsterkte meting wanneer de lamp aan is (lamp schakeld kort uit tijdens meting). 
Standaard: 0, 
Bereik: 0, 5 - 120 [min]
0 = functie is uitgeschakeld

hint.en:
When this mode is ON – device overrides its own light sensor values and uses Light report values from any Z-Wave light sensor instead. This has to be configured appropriately to send light automatically.
If the last remote light level value is older than 30 minutes, the internal light value is used again until the next external value is received.
hint.nl:
Wanneer deze modus ingeschakeld is – apparaat overschrijft de eigen lichtsterkte metingen en gebruikt de metingen van een hieraan gekoppelde Z-wave licht sensor. Dit moet op de correcte manier ingesteld worden.
Wanneer de laatste lichtsterkte waarde ouder is dan 30 minuten wordt de interne lichtsterkte waarde opnieuw gebruikt totdat een nieuwe externe waarde ontvangen wordt.

hint.en:
Be careful with this option.
Please read manual for the right settings

Pas deze optie met beleid toe
Lees voor gebruik van deze optie de handleiding

label.en: Normal mode with lifeline error signalisation

hint.en:
0 = Lamp is switched off and remains off until new motion event.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255: Lamp is switched off for the time set in 'Motion detection ON'
hint.nl:
0 = Lamp is uitgeschakeld en blijft uit tot nieuwe bewegingsdetectie.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-uur resolutie
Lamp is uitgeschakeld voor de tijdsduur ingesteld in 'Bewegingsdetectie AAN tijd'

label.en: Response after BASIC ON (and similar commands).
label.nl: Reactie na BASIC ON (en vergelijkbare commandos).

hint.en:
0 = Lamp is switched on and remains on until new motion event.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255: Lamp is switched on for TIME
hint.nl:
0 = Lamp is ingeschakeld en blijft uit tot nieuwe bewegingsdetectie.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-uur resolutie
255: Lamp is uitgeschakeld voor de tijdsduur ingesteld in 'Bewegingsdetectie AAN tijd'

hint.en:
Time limit to stop waiting for motion after timeout of 'Response after BASIC ON' or OFF_ON_BEHAVIOUR
0 = Stop waiting just after timeout.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255, Never stop waiting before motion.
hint.nl:
Tijd limiet om te stoppen met wachten voor een bewegingsdetectie na timeout 'Reactie na BASIC ON' of OFF_ON_BEHAVIOUR
0 = Stop met wachten na timeout.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-uur resolutie
255, Stop niet met wachten voor bewegingsdetectie.

hint.en:
0 = Lamp is switched on.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255, device ignores OFF - ON sequence and uses OFF behaviour.
hint.nl:
0 = Lamp is ingeschakeld.
timeout: 1 seconde (1) to 100 seconden (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minuut (101) to 100 minuten (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 uur (209) in 1-uur resolutie
255, device negeert UIT-AAN sequence en gebruikt UIT gedrag.

hint.en:
0 = Lamp is switched off.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255, device ignores ON - OFF sequence and uses OFF behaviour.
hint.nl:
0 = Lamp is uitgeschakeld.
timeout: 1 seconde (1) to 100 seconden (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minuut (101) to 100 minuten (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 uur (209) in 1-uur resolutie
255, device negeert AAN - UIT sequence en gebruikt AAN gedrag.

hint.en: Time in [ 100 miliseconds ] of maximum delay between BASIC ON and BASIC OFF ( and vice versa ) to consider this as a sequence. It is typically 1 second, but can be exceptionally longer due to retransmissions and overload – in this case, a longer interval can be allowed ( up to 5 seconds ).
hint.nl: Tijd in [ 100 miliseconds ] of maximale vertraging tussen BASIC ON en BASIC OFF ( en vice versa ) om als een serie beschouwd te worden. Typisch 1 seconde, maar kan exceptioneel langer duren in verband met het opnieuw versturen – in dit geval kan een hogere interval ingesteld worden ( tot 5 seconds ).

hint.en:
0 = BASIC SET to Motion endpoint ignored, Motion sensor still enabled.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-second resolution
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minute resolution
timeout: 1 hour (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-hour resolution
255, BASIC SET to Motion endpoint ignored, Motion sensor still disabled.
hint.nl:
0 = BASEC SET naar apparaat wordt genegeert, Bewegingssensor is ingeschakeld.
timeout: 1 second (1) to 100 seconds (100) in 1-seconde resolutie
timeout: 1 minute (101) to 100 minutes (200) 1-minuut resolutie
timeout: 1 uur (201) to 9 hours (209) in 1-uur resolutie
255: BASIC SET naar apparaat wordt genegeert, Bewegingssensor uitgeschakeld
